column4: ok, so ive got a copy of 5.10 going, and i put in the 7.04 disk, how can I wipe the OS and install the new one?
carlFK, would that be the begin/install ubuntu option?
if you want to wipe the whole hard drive, boot from the 7.04 cd and follow the installation and tell it to use the whole disk erasing whats allready there
have  a look at this website, its a walk through on how to install https://help.ubuntu.com/community/GraphicalInstall
